headline: Clearly, Florida on point about math textbooks being woke indoctrination manuals
author: Roger Guffey
sentences: This is clearly a heresy against the Christian faith because the Bible unequivocally states in I Kings 7:23 and II Chronicles 4:2 that the ratio of the circumference of a circular kettle to its diameter is exactly three.

Florida recently rejected dozens of mathematics textbooks proposed for adoption in the state schools because the books contained objectionable material designed to indoctrinate students with liberal ideologies.
Governor Ron DeSantis deserves the medal of honor for standing up to these woke bullies who have pushed their subversive materials on an unsuspecting public.
Our precious children have to make a hard choice: accepting the secular definition of pi or risk condemning their eternal souls to eternal damnation.
The distributive property obviously alludes to the socialist dream of redistribution of wealth amassed by hard working capitalists.
Once students have accepted this additive identity element how long before they are seduced into talking about gender identity?
Flagrant anti-American ideology lurks among these properties our impressionable students are forced to learn to pass the class.
Pi, the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter is supposedly an irrational number approximately equal to 3.14.
The deviants teaching our kids math are unashamedly corrupting our children by implying that the Bible is wrong.
The dangerous indoctrination begins as early as kindergarten because students are forced to use Arabic numbers.
Algebra, the bane of teenagers everywhere, is an Arabic word al-jabr? meaning the reunion of broken parts.
Be honest: Doesnt LXXXIX + CXLVIII = CCXXXVII make as much sense as anything you learned in algebra?
If the purpose of education is to teach rational thinking, why do we even have irrational numbers?
The insidious algebra deals in axions, definitions and properties that expose their true purpose.
Is it just a coincidence that the word commutative shares most of its letters with communism?
If Roman numerals were good enough for Jesus, they are good enough for me.
The average American has no idea of the evils lurking in these disguises.
One of basic properties is that zero is the additive identity element.
One of the first properties they learn is the commutative property.
The associative property is clear reference to creeping socialism.
What the heck are imaginary numbers and irrational numbers?
The situation worsens in algebra two and geometry.
Dont students struggle enough with real numbers?
Math is about numbers, not letters.
I have done my own research online.
